task.title: Opening the Document Chat panel
task.shortdesc: To begin using the plugin, you first have to open its panel inside Adobe XD.

step.cmd: Press Ctrl+Shift+P on Windows or Command+Shift+P on macOS to open the plugin panel
step.stepresult: The plugins panel (showing all the available plugins) opens on the left-hand side of the XD window.
